SEO_Fundamentals.description: Core SEO principles and the 20% that matters
keyTopics: Technical SEO basics (Google Search Console, sitemaps)
On-page optimization (70% rule: title, meta, URL, H1, first sentence)
Adding exact keywords to existing content
Clone and redirect technique for non-ranking pages

Bottom_of_Funnel_Strategy.description: Converting high-intent traffic with solution-focused keywords
keyTopics: Higher conversion rates with less content
UGC platforms ranking in Google (YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok)
Maximum coverage: same keyword across platforms
Clickable links from Facebook and YouTube

I_need_quick_SEO_wins.expectedResults: Ranking improvements for keywords at positions 6-25

I_want_to_understand_SEO_basics.expectedResults: Focus on the 20% of SEO that delivers 80% of results

I_want_more_conversions_not_just_traffic.expectedResults: Higher conversion rates, less competitive keywords

My_page_is_not_ranking_at_all.expectedResults: Page reassessed with current topical authority

I_need_a_2026_SEO_strategy.timeInvestment: Few minutes per video, multi-platform posting
I_need_a_2026_SEO_strategy.expectedResults: Maximum keyword coverage across web and UGC platforms

low-hanging-fruit-seo.title: People with websites don't know this - Low-Hanging Fruit SEO
coreConcepts: Google Search Console export and filtering
Keywords ranking positions 6-25 are low-hanging fruit
Add exact keyword phrases to existing content
5-minute optimizations for ranking improvements
actionableSteps: 1. Go to Google Search Console > Performance > Search Results
2. Export data to spreadsheet
3. Filter for positions 6-25
4. Add exact keyword to existing relevant content
5. Resubmit URL to Google Search Console

pareto-seo.title: Pareto SEO: The 20% of SEO That Matters
coreConcepts: 80/20 principle in SEO
Technical SEO: Google Search Console + sitemaps
70% of on-page SEO: 5 key locations for keywords
Bottom-of-funnel keywords convert better with less work
Niche directories for backlinks
actionableSteps: 1. Connect Google Search Console, submit sitemaps
2. Put keyword in: page title, meta description, URL, H1, first sentence
3. Target bottom-of-funnel keywords (solutions) not top-of-funnel (questions)
4. Export Google Search Console data, find positions 6-25
5. Submit to niche directories with rich descriptions

2026-seo-playbook-maximize-coverage.title: The 2026 SEO Playbook - Maximize Coverage
coreConcepts: UGC platforms rising in Google rankings
Same keyword = website page + multiple videos
YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok coverage
Keyword at beginning of title/description
Link back from clickable platforms
actionableSteps: 1. Create website page for target keyword
2. Create short video on same topic/keyword
3. Post to all platforms: YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok
4. Put keyword at beginning of title
5. Use video transcript as description
6. Link to website from YouTube and Facebook descriptions

bottom-of-funnel-seo-love-letter.title: My Love Letter to Bottom-of-Funnel SEO
coreConcepts: 222,000 clicks per year from Google for free
Bottom-of-funnel = people know what they want, not which brand
Requires 7-10X LESS content than top-of-funnel
Higher conversion rates
/uses/ or /services/ hub structure
300-500 words per landing page
actionableSteps: 1. Identify bottom-of-funnel keywords (solutions, not questions)
2. Create hub page at /uses/ or /services/
3. Create individual landing pages (300-500 words each)
4. Add CTA at top and bottom of each page
5. Score 92+ on Moz On-Page Grader
6. Get backlinks via Product Hunt, BetaList, podcasts, directories, HARO

10-minute-seo-hack-that-took-my-page-fro.title: 10-Minute SEO Hack That Took My Page From Invisible to #1 on Google
coreConcepts: Clone and redirect technique for non-ranking pages
Pages get reassessed with current topical authority
301 redirect transfers link juice
Results in 2 weeks
Works when site has gained authority since page creation
actionableSteps: 1. Clone the non-ranking page to new URL
2. Make minor edits to URL, title, meta, opening (5 minutes)
3. 301 redirect old URL to new URL
4. Update internal links to new URL
5. Submit both URLs to Google Search Console

keyword_targeting.recommendation: Focus on bottom-of-funnel for higher conversions

google_search_console.usage: Export data, inspect URLs, submit new/updated pages

301_redirects.purpose: Transfer link juice to new URL
301_redirects.useCase: When page needs reassessment with current topical authority
301_redirects.process: Clone page > minor edits > redirect old to new > update internal links

landing_page_structure.hubStructure: /uses/ or /services/ page linking to individual keyword pages

quickWins: Journalist queries (HARO, Help a B2B Writer, Featured, Qwoted)
backlinkStrategies.niches: Submit to niche directories with rich descriptions

navigationHelper.startHere: pareto-seo - Get the 20% of SEO that matters
